about_the_game:
Build your own colorful little worlds, however you like.
Islands & Trains is a very relaxing sandbox builder game.



Build tiny dioramas with just one shed or idyllic villages with dense forests.
Lay your own railroad on top of your beloved island. Place animals in the countryside and just watch & enjoy your peaceful creation. Get lost in finding the most perfect place for all these little pieces.

No goals, no timer, no missions, no stress. Just happy accidents.
Build, relax, enjoy.




Of course we were inspired by wonderful games such as Islanders, Dorfromantik and Townscaper.
